OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: VPL/GetBiilingAccountDetails

omniProcessElements.description: Get the billing information details of Billing / Consumer account.
omniProcessElements.name: DRGetBillingProfileDetails
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "%FetchAccount:AccountRecordType% = 'Business' || %FetchAccount:AccountRecordType% = 'Consumer'", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "AccountId" : "=IF(%FetchAccount:AccountRecordType% = 'Business',%SVBillingAccountDetails:BillingAccountId%,%FetchAccount:AccountId%)" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "VPLGetBillingAccount", "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ ], "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction1", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.description: Get the account details of a business account and its child billing account.
omniProcessElements.name: DRGetBusinessAccountDetails
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "%FetchAccount:AccountRecordType% = 'Business'", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : false, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "bundle" : "VPLGetBusinessAccountDetails", "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "element" : "FetchAccount:AccountId", "inputParam" : "AccountId" } ], "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "ignoreCache" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction1", "show" : null }

omniProcessElements.description: This IP fetches Account Id from Customer Interaction / Account record page

omniProcessElements.description: Fetches related billing account of current business account at grant parent level or up in the account hierarchy.
omniProcessElements.name: GetRelatedBillingAccount
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "executionConditionalFormula" : "%FetchAccount:AccountRecordType% = 'Business' && %DRGetBusinessAccountDetails:BillingAccountId%==null", "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "useFormulas" : true, "additionalInput" : { "CurrentBusinessAccountId" : "=%DRGetBusinessAccountDetails:BusinessAccountId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "failureResponse" : { }, "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : true, "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "responseJSONPath" : "", "responseJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendJSONNode" : "", "remoteClass" : "VEEAppHandler", "remoteOptions" : { }, "remoteMethod" : "getBillingAccountDetails", "chainOnStep" : false, "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "disOnTplt" : false, "label" : "RemoteAction2", "show" : null }
